actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to designate the medal of honor award for military heroism as the "congressional medal of honor", and to amend subchapter IV of chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, relating to the Medal of Honor Roll.

summary.text: Renames the Medal of Honor the Congressional Medal of Honor, and the Medal of Honor Roll the Congressional Medal of Honor Roll.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to designate the medal of honor award for military heroism as the "congressional medal of honor", and to amend subchapter IV of chapter 15 of title 38, United States Code, relating to the Medal of Honor Roll.
